item.description:
Transformational Breathwork Group.

Regular weekly group in Boston area. Every Saturday 1-3 PM.
Open to general audiences. Queer friendly. Please RSVP to secure spot.

To read more about Transformational Breathwork please check this meetup intro & board.

If you chose to enroll into breathwork sessions, attending
free post-session meetup meetings is recommended: they
will provide venue for support, connecting and sharing
experiences.


For session: wear comfortable clothes.
Studio provides yoga mats and blankets, but feel free
to bring your own, and a small pillow. Please let me
know in advance if you use medications, and / or if
you had recent surgeries. Refrain from heavy meal
1 hour prior to breathwork.


What to expect from session:

  • Stress reduction, relaxation, centering and balance.
  • Possible emotional release.
  • Revisiting and resolution of past traumas.
  • Healing of unresolved past relationships.
  • Powerful transformational insights.
  • Clarity and resolutions about one's life purpose.
  • Self-healing meditative states.
  • Possible sense of unity, bliss and love.
  • Physical, emotional and psychological therapeutic effects.
  • Improved relationships.
  • Energizing sense of rejuvenation.
  • Empowerment and fulfillment in life.
  • Emerging clearer, lighter, integrated in your body.


Preparing for session:

  • Revisit problems and issues you would like to be healed.
  • Go over events in your family, relationships, at workplace:
    assess what would you like to change in your life, and why.
  • Take time to meditate, or simply go inside and refine
    those important questions about your life and yourself that
    you need to have answered.
  • Revisit events of this week, communications and behaviors.
    Consciously ID your ego-driven motivations and actions: desire to
    win, to be right, to control others and circumstances. Revisit
    your thoughts of superiority and inferiority, attachment
    to victim mentality, emotional clinging, whether you are
    seeking others to complete you. Notice whether you had
    defensive reactions and judgments. Make a choice to release
    ego-driven thoughts and feelings during breathwork session.
  • Time that you invest into breathwork session
    is the time you invest into achieving your highest self possible.
    Honor yourself for courage and choice of self-healing that you make.
  • If you had breathwork sessions before, notice changes occurring
    in you and your life, take time to reflect, write in your journal,
    maybe make a 'wish list' of what would you like to see next.




Group session fees:
--- NOTE: Money should not be a preclusion for
your healing and experience. If you need financial
arrangements contact me,
you won't be turned down---

$40 for single session.
$175 for 5 sessions.
$300 for 10 sessions.
Commit yourself to 5 or 10 sessions,
and pay lower rate in installments.
No expiration, no weekly attendance requirements.

We recommend 10 consecutive sessions
for best cumulative healing effect, and as the most efficient approach
to accelerate your personal growth and learning,
and enabling you to do breathwork on your own.
This unique,
simple and accessible healing and spiritual growth
modality will become your natural lifestyle.


One-to-one sessions available, please inquire.
Personal sessions are 2-3 hours in length, entail sharing,
psychodramatic techniques and breathwork session.
You benefit from facilitator's undivided attention.
Sessions for couples and those entering partnerships available.
Please feel free to email with any questions
or to set a phone conversation.
Elena
item.name: Transformational Breahtwork Group
